methodref.name: FromCSS
methodref.description: Populate a named style from a CSS definition (uses HTML attributes & format wherever possible).

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Convert named visual style string to an named visual style definition.

methodref.name: ToCSS
methodref.description: Output style sheet to CSS version.

methodref.name: ToString
methodref.description: Output the named visual style string that represents the named visual style definition.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
